name: elearning-platform
description: Production-ready E-Learning Platform (Udemy-like) with Design Patterns

scripts.dev: npm run docker:up && npm run wait-db && npm run setup:backend && concurrently --kill-others --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.setup:backend: cd ../Source/backend && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate:dev && npm run prisma:seed
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install -w ../Source/frontend && npm install -w ../Source/backend
scripts.build: npm run build -w ../Source/frontend && npm run build -w ../Source/backend
